scenario_text.value:
Come on, Kaito! Would you snap out of it
already?!

You being Miu’s brother doesn’t make you
responsible for everything about her!

Even now, when you’re so upset, it’s all
about Miu! What about what you want, Kaito?!

What I want is for Miu to be safe! For her to
have her revenge! That’s what I want!

That’s not true! You’re a very kind person,
Kaito.

You’d do anything for Miu, no matter how hard
it was, and no matter how much it hurt you.

But there’s a difference between caring for
Miu and doing terrible things in her name!

Don’t let your kindness be twisted the wrong
way! It doesn’t have to be like this!

Keep your delusions about me to yourself! I
hope you’re ready for me to come shut you up!
